name: The Lost Island (Discontinued)
description:
You, Marcus, were on a cruise with your friends.

When you were asleep, your cruise's room window had smashed and you woke up to take a closer look.
Unfortunately for you, the cruise had turned left and you fell out of the window you were inspecting.

You manage to find some cargo crates floating around and you pass out from the coldness of the water.

When you wake up, you are on an island with no signs of civilization.

The Future of ScribblesINK

I'm not a very known developer I know that. But, I don't think I will ever make any games like this again. If you enjoy this, I highly recommend going to Replit and you will find possibly much better text-adventure games. I am currently planning on releasing a Unity3D game inspired by FNAF & Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion so yeah look forward to that i guess.
